flagDescription: A Jolly Roger featuring a phoenix design, stolen by the Accino Family

keyMoments.title: Phoenix Pirates' Defeat in the New World
keyMoments.description: Through flashback, the crew's devastating defeat in the New World is revealed, showing how they were attacked by a powerful enemy and forced to flee.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the traumatic event that broke the crew's spirit and led to them working for the Accino Family.

keyMoments.title: Loss of First Mate Vigaro
keyMoments.description: Vigaro sacrifices himself to save the crew during their escape from the New World, dying to disable the enemy ship's rudder.
keyMoments.significance: Vigaro's death is the core traumatic event that destroys Puzzle's confidence and will to continue as pirates.

keyMoments.title: Puzzle Declares They Are No Longer Pirates
keyMoments.description: Captain Puzzle announces to his crew that they will no longer pursue their pirate dreams and will continue working for the Accino Family.
keyMoments.significance: Represents the lowest point for the crew, having lost their identity and purpose as pirates.

rivalries.description: The Phoenix Pirates were defeated by the Accino Family and forced to work for them as subordinates.

goals.goal: Reach the New World and find the One Piece

reveals.information: Attempted to sail in the New World but were defeated by a powerful enemy
Currently working as subordinates to the Accino Family bounty hunters
Lost their first mate Vigaro during their defeat in the New World
Captain Puzzle has declared they are no longer pirates

name.japanese: アッチーノファミリー

keyMoments.title: Steals Straw Hat Jolly Roger
keyMoments.description: The Accino Family successfully steals the Straw Hat Pirates' flag using a little girl on a flying fish.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the main conflict of the arc as the Straw Hats must recover their stolen flag.

keyMoments.title: Pursues Phoenix Pirates and Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: The Accino Family learns Puzzle has survived and begins pursuing both pirate crews for their bounties.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Accino Family as active threats to both crews.

rivalries.description: The Accino Family is hunting the Straw Hat Pirates and has stolen their flag.
The Accino Family controls the Phoenix Pirates as subordinates after defeating them.

goals.goal: Capture pirates and collect their flags as trophies

reveals.information: Uses controlled icebergs to trap ships and steal pirate flags
Controls an area filled with moving icebergs leading to their base
Seeking to capture both the Straw Hat Pirates and Phoenix Pirates for bounties
